description: GitHub Pages deployment setup - Configure Vite base path and GitHub Actions workflow for automatic deployment

userStories.title: Configure Vite base path for GitHub Pages
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the build to use the correct base path so assets load correctly on GitHub Pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Update vite.config.ts to set base: '/sample-slice-tool/' for production builds
Base path should only apply in production (not development)
Verify dist/index.html references assets with /sample-slice-tool/ prefix

userStories.title: Add GitHub Actions workflow for deployment
userStories.description: As a developer, I want automatic deployment to GitHub Pages when I push to main.
acceptanceCriteria: Workflow triggers on push to main branch
Workflow runs npm ci, npm run build
Workflow has proper permissions (pages: write, id-token: write)

userStories.title: Create main branch from current state
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a main branch to trigger deployments from.
acceptanceCriteria: Create main branch from current branch HEAD
Main branch contains all current features and commits
Verify main branch exists with git branch --list main
